header.title: New Log
header.explainer: Learn how to get the best AI estimates

paywall.title: AI Logging is a Pro Feature
paywall.body: Log meals effortlessly with a photo, text, or your voice.

cameraDenied.title: Camera permission denied
cameraDenied.message: Please allow camera access in settings to take photos.

microphoneDenied.title: Microphone permission denied
microphoneDenied.message: Please allow microphone access in settings to use voice input.

aiEstimation.title: Pro tips for best results

bullets.weights: Add weights or volumes for precision (e.g., "150g chicken breast" vs. "chicken breast").
bullets.details: Mention cooking methods or standout ingredients (e.g., "grilled with olive oil").

bullets.frame: Keep every item in frame and uncovered.

bullets.tone: Speak naturally—as if you were typing.
bullets.details: Mention weights, ingredients, and cooking methods.

aiEstimation.footer: For the most accurate results, use measured quantities whenever you can.

primary.label: Calories & Protein
primary.title: Primary
primary.description: Hit these to stay on track with your gain/loss target and build muscle.

secondary.label: Fat
secondary.title: Secondary
secondary.description: Meet this baseline to support hormones and nutrient absorption.

filler.label: Carbs
filler.title: Filler
filler.description: Your go-to workout fuel. Enjoy carbs freely once calories, protein, and fat are covered.

bullets.ring: The ring fills as you log meals.
bullets.close: Close the ring to hit today's budget.

bullets.weekly: Judge progress by your weekly average, not a single day.

bullets.ring: The ring fills as you log protein.
bullets.close: Close the ring to reach today's minimum protein target.

bullets.eachMeal: Include a protein source in every meal or snack.
bullets.spread: Spread intake throughout the day for better recovery.
bullets.over: Going slightly over is fine—aim to meet or gently exceed the target.

hitTarget.title: Hit your daily target
hitTarget.body: Aim for a steady baseline each day to keep energy and meals satisfying.

why.title: Why it matters
why.body: Dietary fat supports hormones, helps absorb vitamins, and keeps you full.

bullets.cook: Cook with olive or avocado oil; include nuts, seeds, whole eggs, and salmon.
bullets.balance: Saturated fat is fine in moderation—balance it across the day.

total.title: A flexible total
total.body: No fixed target—carbs fill remaining calories after protein and fat. Expect the number to vary day to day.

bullets.adjust: Increase on hard training days; scale down on rest days.
bullets.timing: Choose slower-digesting carbs most of the time; use faster carbs around workouts.

bullets.whole: Rice, potatoes, oats, beans, fruit, whole-grain breads or wraps.
bullets.limit: Limit sugary drinks and ultra-processed sweets.

macrosCard.staleMessage: Values reflect previous ingredients and amounts.

validation.nameShort: Name must be at least {{count}} characters.
validation.nameLong: Name must be less than {{count}} characters.
validation.amountInvalid: Enter a valid amount greater than 0.
validation.amountPrecision: Amount can have at most 1 decimal place.

discard.title: Discard changes?
discard.message: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard them?

delete.title: Delete Ingredient
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this ingredient?

accessibility.editHint: Opens editor to modify amount and unit

swipeActions.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
swipeActions.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to perform this action?

subscription.label: SUBSCRIPTION
subscription.canceledWithoutDate: Auto-renew canceled. Access until current period ends.
subscription.upgradeDescription: Ingredient detection, Nutrition estimation, effortless tracking.

restore.title: Already subscribed?
restore.subtitle: Restore purchases after reinstalling the app or switching devices.

notFound.title: Nothing to restore
notFound.message: We couldn't find past purchases for this Apple ID.

seed.title: Seed Sample Logs
seed.subtitle: Add demo logs for QA flows.

alert.message: This deletes all logs and any saved photos. This cannot be undone.

alert.title: Clear Nutrition Goals
alert.message: Remove all saved macro targets? This cannot be undone.
